page.title: 09AGRICULTURE
page.content: Lower Sycamore Farm owned by the Cowgills. Cowgills have worked on the farm for fifteen years,and have been farming in the area for the last thirty years. Mr Cowgills farm cover 100 acres or 40 hectares of land .Mr Cowgills is a dariy farmer,his cows are freesians,they are milked by machine. They eat grass and specially prepared pellets containing protein and vitamin _s.Most of the milk produced is sold locally,surplus milk is sent to the CO_OP Retail Service.Crops that are grown on the farm are barley and potoes.The barley for feeding the cattle and the potatoes for us. The busiest times of the year for the Cowgills is between May and June and August and September.A typical day on the farm is spent feeding the stock and taking care of the machinery.
